Question
========

A person achieves a score of 14.7 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 9.9 with a standard deviation 1.8. The z-score of the person with 14.7 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 2.67
* 3.07
* 3.46

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.67: Correct
* 3.07: Incorrect
* 3.46: Incorrect
